message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the excitement around the product. I believe $150 would be a fair price for me considering my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $175 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose $160 as the price for the product.
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you consider $170 for the product?
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I value your flexibility. I would like to counter with $165 as the price for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you consider $168 for the product?
